GAMEPLAY_BulletsBoxDescription.English: A box of 50 bullets for reloading ammunition.

GAMEPLAY_RevolverReloadingBoxDescription.English: A box of 40 bullets and shell casings for reloading revolver ammunition.

GAMEPLAY_RifleReloadingBoxDescription.English: A box of 15 bullets and shell casings for reloading rifle ammunition.

GAMEPLAY_SmallGunpowderCanDescription.English: A small can for carrying gunpowder.
